column4: Hello, I am trying to install an audio driver.  When I do so, I get an error message: checking for libasound headers version >= 1.0.12... not present.  What can I do?
you did install the libasound-dev package?
yep do an 'apt-cache search libasound ' and look for a whtever-dev package
- seems like it's already installed, no?
search is NOT showing a list of whats installed.
install the package.. :) if its allready installed it wont hurt anything.
- Sorry, I'm brand-new with Linux, how do I install the package?
now would be a good time to read some ubuntu beginners guides.  "sudo apt-get install PACKAGENAME" is one way. or use the synaptic package manager tool.
libasound2 is already the newest version.
i believe I already installed it before.
libasound2-dev may be the package name for the developer files.. use synaptic and LOOK and see whats installed.
libasound2 is installed.  i just looked at synaptic.  the installed version is 1.0.14.
libasound2    and    libasound2-dev are 2 DIFFERNT packages. :) you understand this?
you want to install   libasound2-dev   in addation to libasound2 :)
